workshoptitle: Develop with Oracle AI and Database Services: Financials (Cloud Native Version)

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setup (Database, Kubernetes, Observability/Otel, Security, Backend for MS and AI...)
Lab 2: Create/Update profile and bank account (React, Spring Boot)
Lab 3: External bank transfer (MicroTx, Lock-free reservations)
Lab 4: Transfer to internal and brokerage accounts (Kafka vs TxEventQ)
Lab 5: Deposit/withdraw cash from ATM (.NET, Go, C++, Rust and WASM (polyglot))
Lab 6: Mobile check deposit (OCI Vision/document with Oracle Database)
Lab 7: Purchase from retailer using credit card (MongoDB and relational duality, distributed database)
Lab 8: Bank Account Statement and Portfolio Analysis (Apache Flink, Iceberg)
Lab 9: Fraud alerts on credit card purchase (OML, Graph, Knative Eventing, CloudEvents, Spatial)
Lab 11: Financial PDF/doc search (Vector Search, RAG)
Lab 12: Stock Ticker and Purchase (TrueCache, priority transactions, session-less transactions)
Lab 14: "Speak with your (financial) data" (Select AI, Vector Search (AI Explorer for Apps), Speech AI)
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
